languages.text: ...издает отвратительный свист прямо у меня над ухом. Четвероногий прислужник мон-кая вцепляется в мой затылок железными зубами, силясь перегрызть позвоночник. Усиленные позвонки трещат, в глазах темнеет. Я ударом отбрасываю механизированную тварь в сторону и хватаю Жертву за шею. Ее игрушка ослабила мои рефлексы, и я с удовольствием переломаю ей лапы позже. А пока Жертва...

...lets out a repulsive whistle. The mon-keigh's four-legged servant sinks its metal teeth into the back of my head, seeking to chew through my spine. My reinforced vertebrae crack; my vision begins to dim. I strike the mechanised creature, tossing it aside, and grab the Prey by the neck. Its plaything has weakened my reflexes, and I will take pleasure in breaking the creature's legs later. But right now, the Prey...
languages.original_text: ...издает отвратительный свист прямо у меня над ухом. Четвероногий прислужник мон-кая вцепляется в мой затылок железными зубами, силясь перегрызть позвоночник. Усиленные позвонки трещат, в глазах темнеет. Я ударом отбрасываю механизированную тварь в сторону и хватаю Жертву за шею. But right now, the Prey...

I strike the mechanised creature, tossing it aside, and grab the Prey by the neck. Its plaything has weakened my reflexes, and I will take pleasure in breaking the creature's legs later. But right now, the Prey...

languages.text: ……发出令人厌恶的口哨声。那只猴子的四脚仆人一口咬住了我的后脑，打算用金属牙齿咬断我的脊椎。我加固的脊椎被咬裂了，视线也变得模糊。我狠狠地砸了这只机械生物一下，把它甩到一旁，抓住了猎物的脖子。猎物的玩具削弱了我的反应速度，等我解决了猎物之后，我会把它的腿一条条打断。至于现在，猎物……
languages.original_text: ...lets out a repulsive whistle. The mon-keigh's four-legged servant sinks its metal teeth into the back of my head, seeking to chew through my spine. My reinforced vertebrae crack; my vision begins to dim. I strike the mechanised creature, tossing it aside, and grab the Prey by the neck. Its plaything has weakened my reflexes, and I will take pleasure in breaking the creature's legs later. But right now, the Prey...

traits.locale_text: 那只猴子的四脚仆人一口咬住了我的后脑，打算用金属牙齿咬断我的脊椎。我加固的脊椎被咬裂了，视线也变得模糊。我狠狠地砸了这只机械生物一下，把它甩到一旁，抓住了猎物的脖子。猎物的玩具削弱了我的反应速度，等我解决了猎物之后，我会把它的腿一条条打断。至于现在，猎物……

languages.text: …嫌な感じの口笛を鳴らす。モン＝ケイの四足歩行の従者が、金属の歯を私の後頭部に突き立て、背骨ごと噛み砕こうとする。強化された椎骨に亀裂が入り、視界がぼやけ始めた。私はその機械仕掛けの生物を殴って払いのけ、獲物の首を掴んだ。そいつのおもちゃに邪魔されたせいで私の反応速度は鈍ったが、後にそいつの足を徹底的に折ってやろう。しかし、今は…獲物こそ重要なのだ。
languages.original_text: The mon-keigh's four-legged servant sinks its metal teeth into the back of my head, seeking to chew through my spine. My reinforced vertebrae crack; my vision begins to dim. I strike the mechanised creature, tossing it aside, and grab the Prey by the neck. Its plaything has weakened my reflexes, and I will take pleasure in breaking the creature's legs later. But right now, the Prey...

traits.locale_text: モン＝ケイの四足歩行の従者が、金属の歯を私の後頭部に突き立て、背骨ごと噛み砕こうとする。強化された椎骨に亀裂が入り、視界がぼやけ始めた。私はその機械仕掛けの生物を殴って払いのけ、獲物の首を掴んだ。そいつのおもちゃに邪魔されたせいで私の反応速度は鈍ったが、後にそいつの足を徹底的に折ってやろう。しかし、今は…獲物こそ重要なのだ。

languages.text: ... lässt ein abstoßendes Pfeifen hören. Der vierbeinige Diener des Chem-Pan-Sey versenkt seine Metallzähne in meinem Hinterkopf und will meine Wirbelsäule durchbeißen. Meine verstärkten Wirbel zerbrechen, meine Sicht schwindet. Ich schlage die mechanische Kreatur, werfe sie zur Seite und packe die Beute am Hals. Ihr Spielzeug hat meine Reflexe geschwächt, und ich werde die Beine der Kreatur später mit Freude brechen. Aber jetzt ist die Beute ...
languages.original_text: ...lets out a repulsive whistle. The mon-keigh's four-legged servant sinks its metal teeth into the back of my head, seeking to chew through my spine. My reinforced vertebrae crack; my vision begins to dim. I strike the mechanised creature, tossing it aside, and grab the Prey by the neck. Its plaything has weakened my reflexes, and I will take pleasure in breaking the creature's legs later. But right now, the Prey...

traits.locale_text: Der vierbeinige Diener des Chem-Pan-Sey versenkt seine Metallzähne in meinem Hinterkopf und will meine Wirbelsäule durchbeißen. Meine verstärkten Wirbel zerbrechen, meine Sicht schwindet. Ich schlage die mechanische Kreatur, werfe sie zur Seite und packe die Beute am Hals. Ihr Spielzeug hat meine Reflexe geschwächt, und ich werde die Beine der Kreatur später mit Freude brechen. Aber jetzt ist die Beute ...

languages.text: İğrenç bir ıslık öttürüyor. Mon-keigh'in dört ayaklı hizmetkârı, omurgamı kemirme gayretiyle metal dişlerini enseme geçiriyor. Takviyeli omurlarım çatırdıyor, görüşüm kararıyor. Mekanik yaratığı savurup Av'ı boğazından yakalıyorum. Oyuncağı reflekslerimi zayıflattı, bundan sonra o yaratığın bacaklarını kırmaktan da keyif alacağım. Fakat şimdi Av...
languages.original_text: ...lets out a repulsive whistle. The mon-keigh's four-legged servant sinks its metal teeth into the back of my head, seeking to chew through my spine. My reinforced vertebrae crack; my vision begins to dim. I strike the mechanised creature, tossing it aside, and grab the Prey by the neck. Its plaything has weakened my reflexes, and I will take pleasure in breaking the creature's legs later. But right now, the Prey...

traits.locale_text: Mon-keigh'in dört ayaklı hizmetkârı, omurgamı kemirme gayretiyle metal dişlerini enseme geçiriyor. Takviyeli omurlarım çatırdıyor, görüşüm kararıyor. Mekanik yaratığı savurup Av'ı boğazından yakalıyorum. Oyuncağı reflekslerimi zayıflattı, bundan sonra o yaratığın bacaklarını kırmaktan da keyif alacağım. Fakat şimdi Av...

languages.text: ... emite un silbido repugnante. El sirviente de cuatro patas del mon-keigh entierra sus colmillos de metal en mi nuca, intentando llegar hasta mi espina dorsal. Mis vértebras reforzadas crujen; mi visión se oscurece. Golpeo a la criatura mecanizada, arrojándola a un lado, y agarro a la presa del cuello. Su juguete ha debilitado mis reflejos, y más tarde disfrutaré partiéndole las patas a la criatura. Pero, ahora mismo, la presa...
languages.original_text: ...lets out a repulsive whistle. The mon-keigh's four-legged servant sinks its metal teeth into the back of my head, seeking to chew through my spine. My reinforced vertebrae crack; my vision begins to dim. I strike the mechanised creature, tossing it aside, and grab the Prey by the neck. Its plaything has weakened my reflexes, and I will take pleasure in breaking the creature's legs later. But right now, the Prey...

traits.locale_text: El sirviente de cuatro patas del mon-keigh entierra sus colmillos de metal en mi nuca, intentando llegar hasta mi espina dorsal. Mis vértebras reforzadas crujen; mi visión se oscurece. Golpeo a la criatura mecanizada, arrojándola a un lado, y agarro a la presa del cuello. Su juguete ha debilitado mis reflejos, y más tarde disfrutaré partiéndole las patas a la criatura. Pero, ahora mismo, la presa...

languages.text: ... pousse un sifflement repoussant. Le serviteur à quatre pattes {mf|du|de la} mon-keigh plonge ses dents de métal dans ma nuque, cherchant à trancher mon échine. Mes vertèbres renforcées craquent et ma vision commence à s'assombrir. Je frappe la créature mécanique, la jette au sol et attrape la proie par le cou. Je me ferai un plaisir de briser les pattes de son jouet qui a osé affaiblir mes réflexes, mais plus tard. Pour le moment, la proie...
